title: Danze D301026BR Cape Anne Two Handle Centerset Lavatory Faucet, Tumbled Bronze
features: Two handle, three hole mount centerset lavatory faucet
Equipped with ceramic disc valve to ensure a silky smooth turning action and keep them drip-free for a lifetime
Spout measures 6-3/4 inch high and 4-1/2 inch in length
Exceeds all national and local low-lead requirements
description: Danze, Inc. is a manufacturer of premium showerheads, faucets, bath accessories and vitreous china fixtures. Danze faucets were first available in 2001. The product line has rapidly developed to include over 1,500 decorative products including 15 collections of faucets for the bath, over 100 faucets for the kitchen and entertainment areas, 10 collections of matching bath accessories and an impressive line of spectacular brass shower products featuring over 130 styles of showerheads and unusual shower arms. Each product is backed with a limited "lifetime" warranty against defect; the company provides immediate access through toll free telephone to assist customers with technical, installation or other questions seven days a week. Danze products offer as standard such quality features as ceramic valves, heavy pattern brass construction, lead free waterways meeting the requirements of the ANSI/NSF 61 and a wide variety of durable and decorative finishes.

Danze by Gerber offers timeless design with the trusted product quality and performance of the Gerber family name. Known for style and design, discover the inspiration, value and performance of Danze by Gerber. From faucets to shower systems, toilets to bath accessories, you can depend on both striking design and uncompromising quality.
